My Expertise

Currently pursuing a A.S. in Computer Science and Economics while pursuing Data Science projects on the side. Has experience with full data analysis cycle from data scraping to data visualization.

Analysis

Experience analyzing data with Python libaries such as Numpy, Pandas, and Matplotlib. Also have experience manipulating data within Excel.

Development

Proficient with numerous programming languages such as Python, C++, and C. Experience building programs with OOP principles.

Visualization

Experienced with visualizing data within Tableau. Compiling projects within Jupyter Notebooks, and posting projects to remote repositories via Git.
